title: I feel like there are some champions you should be perma banned for picking in ranked
body: {{champion:236}} {{champion:64}}  Having these on your team is equivalent to just being afk because 99.9 percent of the time they are absolutely useless and contribute nothing to the game making it feel like a 4v5

replies.body: and there it is, the dumbest thing i'll read today
ADC and jungle have no impact on the game and support is useless. (get outplayed)
Because they take actual skill to play?
Not really they just dont have any fit in a team comp as many champs with a high skill ceiling  are still very good to play such as {{champion:268}} {{champion:142}} {{champion:119}}
None of those characters fit the role of Lee really. Plus I think it depends on the player more than the actual champ often times.
what roles does lee fit in exactly? After the removal of trackers and sightstone his w is practically on the cooldown of his trinket and he doesnt do a good job of being a bruiser or assassin

Honestly, although your title is a bit of an exaggeration, you're not wrong.

Lucian is literal trash-tier, and I have no idea how Lee even has a measurable winrate right now.
Yeah the title was more for comedic affect but the point is that picking chats like that are an autoloss in most situations
I dont think lucian is good in any elo same with lee.
